request.description:
Endpoint for signing a user to the Dr system.


Parameters are:

	+ name (required)
	+ email (required)
	+ password (required)
	+ height (required) - in cm
	+ waist (required) - in cm
	+ weight (required) - in kg
	+ dob (required) - yyyy-mm-dd
	+ gender (required) - 0-Male, 1-Female
	+ bmi (required)
	+ glasses_of_water_per_day (required)
	+ average_stress_level (required)
	+ steps_each_day (required)
	+ sleep_hours_each_night (required)
	+ time_offset (default - 0)

header.name: Allow
header.description: Valid actions for a specified resource. To be used for a 405 Method not allowed

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: X-Frame-Options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

request.description:
Endpoint for retrieving user dashboard

Following are the enums in the response:

	+ meal_type - 0-Five and One, 1-Three and Three, 2-Healthy, 3-Ok, 4-Unhealthy
	+ status - 0-In Progress, 1-Complete, 2-Incomplete, 3-Reset

                "id": 14,

            },

        ],
        "total_completed": 1,
        "status": 0,
        "assessment_date": "2018-06-01",
        "meal_plan": null
    },
    "food_hydration": {
        "id": 32,
        "days_range": {
            "id": 1,
            "start_range": 1,
            "end_range": 21,
            "required_completions": 1,

            "stage": 1
        },
        "day": 3,
        "time_logs": null,
        "total_completed": 0,
        "status": 0,
        "assessment_date": "2018-06-01"
    },
    "motion": null,
    "sleep": null,
    "mind": null,
    "surrounding": null
}

request.description:
Endpoint for choosing next macro for a user

Following are the enums in the response:

	+ next_macro - 0-Weight, 1-Food & Hydration, 2-Motion, 3-Sleep, 4-Mind, 5-Surroundings

request.description:
Endpoint to view all alerts for a user

Macro Type:
- WEIGHT = 0
- FOOD_AND_HYDRATION = 1
- MOTION = 2
- SLEEP = 3
- MIND = 4
- SURROUNDING = 5

Alert Type:
- GENERAL = 0
- TODAY = 1
- COMPLETED = 2
- REMINDER = 3
- FAILED = 4
- BADGE = 5
- WEEKLY_WEIGHT_CHECKUP = 6
- WEEKLY_CHECKUP = 7
- MONTHLY_CHECKUP = 8

response.name: Alerts

header.name: Allow
header.description: Valid actions for a specified resource. To be used for a 405 Method not allowed

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: X-Frame-Options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch
